Module schiffeversenken

Package de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine

package de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine
This package contains all the classes that should be hidden from the user
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.uicomponents
    This package contains home made GUI components.
    de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.utilityscenes
    This package contains scenes that are not really part of the game.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Application
    Application this class contains the application boiler plate code to be run on a graphical OS.
    AssetRegistry
    This class holds all your assets.
    AWTGUIContext
    This class implements an GUI adapter to Java/AWT
    BufferedImageCanvas
    This canvas is SWING/AWT compatible.
    Canvas
    Canvas This class provides 2D adapting capabilities to the underlying graphics stack.
    Controller<Model>
    Instantiate this class in order to implement your user interaction logic.
    GUIContext
    GUIContext This class provides an abstraction to the OS windowing subsystem.
    Scene
    The scene class handles all your top level drawing and interaction distribution.
    SmartScene<Model>
    While a scene object is a low level interface to the graphics stack it lacks some convenience.
    Tile
    This abstract class represents a tile that can be drawn at a given position.
    Vec2
    A 2 dimensional vector based on integers.
    View<Model>
    This class's only purpose is to provide graphical output to your model.
